data.title: Politics latest: Chris Whitty joins government meeting on mpox - as PM suffers post-election poll slump
data.meta_description: Professor Chris Whitty, a key face in the government's response to coronavirus, has joined ministers for a meeting about the UK's preparedness for mpox cases. It comes after the World Health Organization declared a "global health emergency".
data.text:
Professor Chris Whitty, a key face in the government's response to coronavirus, has joined ministers for a meeting about the UK's preparedness for mpox cases. It comes after the World Health Organization declared a "global health emergency".
